item.description:
hey there,

we've been having such a great time at the Sea Monsters shows on sunday nights that we're making it a regular meetup for the rest of the summer.

who are the Sea Monsters? well, it depends on which night you show up. it's never the same lineup two weeks in a row as various members of the incredible local music community sit in.

the simply terrific christian mcneill and jesse dee (co-founders of the Sea Monsters) are constants, but just in the first two weeks we've caught the show, "Sea Monsters for a Night" have included tim gearan, reva williams, and dwight ritcher of the new york based duo, dwight&nicole.

it was fantastic.

other regular Sea Monsters include the fabulous horn section of jeff galindo on trombone, scott aruda on trumpet, and john aruda on sax.

awesome music, great crowd, and delicious beer. you can't go wrong, so if you're up for a late sunday night, come on out and join us at Precinct on sunday nights.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 9 August, 8 p.m.
item.name: Sunday Funday After Hours: Sea Monsters @ Precinct
